conversionErrorMessage: An error occurred while converting the temperature.
savePresetErrorMessage: An error occurred while saving the preset.
saveToHistoryErrorMessage: An error occurred while saving to the conversion history.
loadPresetsErrorMessage: An error occurred while loading presets.
loadHistoryErrorMessage: An error occurred while loading conversion history.
fetchWeatherErrorMessage: An error occurred while fetching the current weather.
positionErrorMessage: An error occurred while getting the current position.
